sections.heading: of Statutes; membership.Until July 15, 1998, the Revisor of Statutes shall continue to serve as an associate member of the National Conference of Commissioners on Uniform State Laws
sections.text: On and after July 15, 1998, the Revisor of Statutes shall serve as a commissioner.SourceLaws 1998, LB 1158, ยง 3.
